title: Player AI Diplomacy Uniforms
description: Defines AI diplomacy behavior, trust/hatred systems, and trade valuations.

alliance_lock_divisor.description: When proposing an alliance lock, the minutes will be divided by this to return the value of said proposition

alliance_stage_modifiers.description: Percentage modifiers applied when requesting each alliance tier.

acceptance_modifier.description: Percentage modifier applied when requesting this alliance type.

trust_growth_under_agreement.description: How much passive trust growth per agreement level

asset_value_diminished_value_per_stage.description: How much trade value is needed for +1% per stage (e.g., [100, 250, 750, 10000, 25000]).

asset_value_modifier_stages.description: Trade value thresholds for diminishing returns (e.g., [1000, 2500, 10000, 50000]).

balance_allowed_to_gift_under_seek_prote.description: How much of their assets, as a percent, an AI is allowed to dump into a gift to seek protection from the strongest player

base_deal_acceptance.description: range in which the AI's base deal acceptance will be determined.

cease_fire_chance.description: percent chance an ai will offer a ceasefire

cease_fire_declined_cooldown_seconds.description: if a ceasefire an AI reaches out with is declined, how long until it tries again.

demand_acceptance_penalty.description: penalty on demanding resources from an AI

gift_trade_value_to_trust_conversion_rat.description: Gift trade value is multiplied by this number before calculating diminishing trust returns.

gift_trust_gain_diminished_value_per_sta.description: How much trade value is needed for +1 trust per stage (e.g., [100, 250, 750, 10000, 25000]).

gift_trust_gain_stages.description: Gift value thresholds for diminishing returns (e.g., [1000, 2500, 10000, 50000])

hatred_growth_per_enemy_culture_dominate.description: hate will increase per enemy culture dominated gravity well that they own. how much?

max_patience.description: maximum patience allowed for the AI.

min_trust_for_cease_fire_offer.description: trust threshold for an AI to reach out to a player with a ceasefire.

patience_regen_in_seconds.description: how long it takes for this AI to regenerate a point of patience.

taunt_chance.description: percent chance an ai will taunt a player

faction_definitions.description: Per faction diplomacy settings and trade valuations.

chance_to_make_trade_offer.description: Roll against this value to see if the AI will reach out with trade offers.

exotic_valuations.description: How this faction values exotic resources in trades.

exotic_name.description: The name of the exotic resource.

exotic_value.description: The AI's valuation of this exotic for trade calculations.

faction_trade_values.description: Base asset valuations for this faction's trades.

influence_valuation_stages.description: How much this AI values influence in stages.

intelligence_costs.description: Influence costs to purchase player intelligence at each alliance level. Keys are alliance types (cease_fire, share_vision, synergy), values are integer costs.

cease_fire.description: Intelligence cost for this alliance level

share_vision.description: Intelligence cost for this alliance level

synergy.description: Intelligence cost for this alliance level

min_trust_for_trade_offers.description: Trust threshold before the AI will reach out with trade offers.

base_hatred.description: Assigns hatred at start of game to players of this faction.

faction_diplomacy_modifier.description: Subfaction global modifier. Permanent throughout game (TEC Primacy will NEVER like Advent Wrath. This is why.)

modified_faction.description: The faction which this object modifies.

no_alliance_intelligence_cost.description: Influence cost to purchase player intelligence when there is no alliance.

planet_valuations.description: How this faction values different planet types in trades.

planet_value.description: The AI's valuation of this planet type for trade calculations.

purchase_intelligence_prerequisite_resea.description: Optional research subject that must be completed before purchasing intelligence. If not specified, no research is required.

this_faction.description: The faction that this definition applies to.

fallback_intelligence_cost.description: Fallback intelligence cost when no faction is found. Default: 5

hatred_diminished_value_per_stage.description: How much hatred is needed for -1% per stage (e.g., [10, 25, 75, 1000, 2500]).

hatred_modifier_stages.description: Hatred score thresholds for diminishing returns (e.g., [100, 250, 1000, 5000]).

intelligence_purchase_cooldown_duration_.description: Cooldown duration in seconds between purchasing intelligence for the same player. Default: 5.0

intelligence_purchase_spool_up_time_in_s.description: Time in seconds it takes to gather intelligence after purchase. Default: 10.0

minutes_allowed_for_reattempt_alliance_b.description: After an AI breaks an alliance with a player, how long in minutes before they are allowed to retry a ceasefire.

minutes_before_allowed_to_seek_protectio.description: How long before an AI is allowed to seek protection from the strongest player

number_of_allies_modifier_table.description: Percentage penalty for each additional ally the target has (e.g., [-5, -15, -40, -70, -100]).

modified_race.description: The race which this object modifies.

race_diplomacy_modifier.description: Race global modifier. Permanent throughout game (TEC will always be suspicious of Advent, etc).

this_race.description: The race that this definition applies to.

seconds_per_hate_growth_passive.description: How long to gain hate from passive sources, such as enemy culture domination

seconds_per_trust_growth_passive.description: How long to gain trust from passive sources, such as agreements

trust_diminished_value_per_stage.description: How much trust is needed for +1% per stage (e.g., [10, 20, 50, 500, 1000]).

trust_modifier_stages.description: Trust score thresholds for diminishing returns (e.g., [100, 250, 1000, 5000]).
